com.microsoft.windowsazure.management

Interface SubscriptionOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SubscriptionOperationsImpl

    public interface SubscriptionOperations
    Operations for listing subscription details. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/gg715315.aspx for more information)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SubscriptionGetResponse get()
      The Get Subscription operation returns account and resource allocation information for the specified subscription.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<SubscriptionGetResponse> getAsync()
      The Get Subscription operation returns account and resource allocation information for the specified subscription.
      SubscriptionListOperationsResponse listOperations(SubscriptionListOperationsParameters parameters)
      The List Subscription Operations operation returns a list of create, update, and delete operations that were performed on a subscription during the specified timeframe.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<SubscriptionListOperationsResponse> listOperationsAsync(SubscriptionListOperationsParameters parameters)
      The List Subscription Operations operation returns a list of create, update, and delete operations that were performed on a subscription during the specified timeframe.
      OperationResponse registerResource(java.lang.String resourceName)
      Register a resource with your subscription.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<OperationResponse> registerResourceAsync(java.lang.String resourceName)
      Register a resource with your subscription.
      OperationResponse unregisterResource(java.lang.String resourceName)
      Unregister a resource with your subscription.

      Unregister a resource with your subscription.

        SubscriptionGetResponse get()
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   ServiceException,
                                   javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                   org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                   java.net.URISyntaxException
        The Get Subscription operation returns account and resource allocation information for the specified subscription. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/hh403995.aspx for more information)
        Returns:
        The Get Subscription operation response.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - Thrown if there was an error parsing a URI in the response.

                                                         ServiceException,
                                                         javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                         org.xml.sax.SAXException
        The List Subscription Operations operation returns a list of create, update, and delete operations that were performed on a subscription during the specified timeframe. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/gg715318.aspx for more information)
        Parameters:
        parameters - Required. Parameters supplied to the List Subscription Operations operation.
        Returns:
        The List Subscription Operations operation response.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.
